S03n225:1: duṣkaraśatasamudānīto'yamasmadarthaṃ tena bhagavatā saddharma iti satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ |
S03n225:4: sa bālyātprabhṛtyeva bṛddhopāsanaratirvinayānurakto'nuraktaprakṛtiḥ prakṛtimedhāvitvādanekavidyādhigamavipulataramatirutsāhamaṃtraprabhāva[prabhutva]-śaktidaivasaṃpannaḥ svā iva prajāḥ prajāḥ pālayati sma |
S03n225:8: alpātmanāṃ yā madireva lakṣmīrbabhūva sā tatra yathārthanāmā ||2 ||
S03n225:11: atha sa rājā dānapriyatvātsamantato nagarasya sarvopakaraṇadhanadhānyasamṛddhā dānaśālāḥ kārayitvā svamāhātmyānurūpaṃ yathābhiprāyasaṃpāditaṃ sopacāraṃ manoharamanatikrāntakālasubhagaṃ dānavarṣaṃ kṛtayugamegha iva vavarṣa |
S03n225:15: atha tasya rājñaḥ pradānaudāryaśravaṇādvismitapramuditahṛdayā nānādigabhilakṣitadeśanivāsinaḥ puruṣāstaṃ deśamupajagmuḥ |
S03n225:18: atha sa rājā samantataḥ samāpatato lābhāśāpramuditamanasaḥ pathikajananepathyapracchāditaśobhasya vanīpakajanasya
S03n225:23: atha kadācitsa rājā dānaśālāḥ samanuvicaraṃstṛptatvādarthijanasya praviralaṃ yācakajanasaṃpātamabhisamīkṣya dānadharmasyānutsarpaṇānna tuṣṭimupajagāma |
S03n225:24: tarṣa vininye'rthijanastametya na tvarthinaḥ prāpya sa dānaśauṇḍaḥ |
S03n225:25: na hyasya dānavyavasāyamarthī yācñāpramāṇena śaśāka jetum ||7 ||
S03n225:26: tasya buddhirabhavat-atisabhāgyāste satpuruṣaviśeṣā ye visrambhaniryantraṇapraṇayamarthibhiḥ svagātrāṇyapi yācyante |
S03n225:27: mama punaḥ pratyākhyānarūkṣākṣaravacanasaṃtarjita ivārthijano dhanamātrake'pragalbhapraṇayaḥ saṃvṛtta iti |
S03n225:28: atha kṣitīśasya tamatyudāraṃ gātreṣvapi sveṣu nivṛttasaṅgam |
S03n225:29: vijñāya dānāśrayiṇaṃ vitarkaṃ patipriyā strīva mahī cakampe ||8 ||
S03n225:30: atha śakro devendraḥ kṣititalacalanādakampite vividharatnaprabhodbhāsini sumerau parvatarāje kimidamiti samutpatitavitarkastasya rājña imaṃ vitarkātiśayaṃ dharaṇītalacalananimittamavetya vismayāvarjitahṛdayaścintāmāpede |
S03n225:34: atha tasya rājñaḥ paṣaṃdi niṣaṇṇasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya samucitāyāṃ kṛtāyāmarthijanasya kaḥ kimicchatītyāhvānāvaghoṣaṇāyāmuddhāṭyamāneṣu kośādhyakṣādhisthiteṣu maṇikanakarajatadhananicayeṣu viśleṣyamāṇāsu puṭāsu vividhavasanaparipūrṇagarbhāsu samupāvartyamāneṣu vinītavividhavāhanaskandhapratiṣṭhitayugeṣu vicitreṣu yānaviśeṣeṣu pravṛttasaṃpāte'rthijane śakro devānāmindro vṛddhamandhaṃ brāhmaṇarūpamabhinirmāya rājñaścakṣuḥpathe prādurabhavat |
S03n225:35: atha tasya rājñaḥ kārūṇyamaitrīparibhāvitayā dhīraprasannasaumyayā pratyudgata iva pariṣvakta iva ca dṛṣṭyā kenārtha ityupanimantryamāṇaḥ kṣitipānucarairnṛpatisamopamupetya jayāśīrvacanapuraḥsaraṃ rājānamityuvāca-
S03n225:37: ekekṣaṇenāpi hi paṅkajākṣa gamyeta lokādhipa lokayātrā ||10 ||
S03n225:38: atha sa bodhisattvaḥ samamilaṣitamanorathaprasiddhyā paraṃ prītyutsavamanubhavan kisvididaṃ satyamevoktaṃ brāhmaṇena syāduta vikalpābhyāsānmayaivamavadhāritamiti jātavimarśaścakṣuryācñāpriyavacanaśravaṇatṛṣitamatistaṃ cakṣuryācanakamuvāca-
S03n225:40: sudustyajaṃ cakṣuriti pravādaḥ saṃbhāvanā kasya mayi vyatītā ||11 ||
S03n225:41: atha sa brāhmaṇaveṣadhārī śakro devendrastasya rājña āśayaṃ viditvovāca-
S03n225:44: atha sa rājā śakrasaṃkīrtanānnunamasya brāhmaṇasya bhavitrī devatānubhāvādanena vidhinā cakṣuḥsaṃpaditi matvā pramodaviśadākṣaramenamuvāca-
S03n225:45: yenābhyupeto'si manorathena tameṣa te brāhmaṇa pūrayāmi |
S03n225:49: syāt kiṃ nu so'yamuta neti vicāradolā-
S03n225:53: prasīda deva mā maivaṃ na cakṣurdātumarhasi ||15 ||
S03n225:55: alaṃ śokāgninā dagdhuṃ sukhaṃ saṃvardhitāḥ prajāḥ ||16 ||
S03n225:57: rathān vinītāśca yujaḥ prayaccha madorjitaśrīlalitān dvipānvā ||17 ||
S03n225:59: gṛhāṇi sarvartusukhāni dehi mā dāḥ svacakṣurjagadekacakṣuḥ ||18 ||
S03n225:65: dhanameva yato dehi deva mā sāhasaṃ kṛthāḥ ||20 ||
S03n225:73: yadapi ceṣṭaṃ devatānubhāvādeva cakṣurasya kiṃ na saṃbhavatītyatra śrūyatām-
S03n225:76: tanna me dānātiśayavyavasāye vidhnāya vyāyantumarhanti bhavanta iti |
S03n225:77: amātyā ūcuḥ-dhanadhānyaratnāni devo dātumarhati na svacakṣuriti vijñāpitamasmābhiḥ |
S03n225:79: yadeva yācyeta tadeva dadyānnānīpsitaṃ prīṇayatīha dattam |
S03n225:81: atha tasya rājño dṛḍhataravisrambhapraṇayaḥ snehāvegādanapekṣitopacāro'mātyamukhyastaṃ rājānamityuvāca-mā tāvad bhoḥ !
S03n225:83: yāmāsādya ca bhūribhirmakhaśataiḥ kīrti divaṃ cāpnuyāt |
S03n225:85: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā nayane praditsati bhavānko'yaṃ kutastyo vidhiḥ ||26 ||
S03n225:87: narendracūḍādyutirañjitāṅghriḥ kiṃ lipsamāno nu dadāsi cakṣuḥ ||27 ||
S03n225:89: nāyaṃ yatnaḥ sārvabhaumatvamāptuṃ naiva svargaṃ nāpavargaṃ na kīrtim |
S03n225:90: trātuṃ lokānityayaṃ tvādaro me yācñākleśo mā ca bhūdasya moghaḥ ||28 ||
S03n225:91: atha sa rājā nīlotpaladalaśakalarucirakānti nayanamekaṃ vaidyaparidṛṣṭena vidhinā śanakairakṣatamutpāṭya parayā prītyā cakṣuryācanakāya prāyacchat |
S03n225:92: atha śakro devendrastādṛśamṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ cakre yathā dadarśa sa rājā saparijanastattasya cakṣuścakṣuḥsthāne pratiṣṭhitam |
S03n225:93: athonmiṣitaikacakṣuṣaṃ cakṣuryācanakamabhivīkṣya sa rājā parameṇa praharṣeṇa samāpūrṇahṛdayo dvitīyamapyasmai nayanaṃ prāyacchat |
S03n225:94: tataḥ sa rājā nayane pradāya vipadmapadmākaratulyavaktraḥ |
S03n225:105: atha tasya rājñaḥ kramātsaṃrūḍhanayanavraṇasyāvagītapratanūbhūtāntaḥpurapaurajānapadaśokasya pravivekakāmatvādudyānapuṣkariṇyāstīre kusumabharāvanatarucirataruvaranicite mṛdusurabhiśiśirasukhapavane madhukaragaṇopakūjite paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇasya śakro devendraḥ purastātprādurabhavat |
S03n225:106: ka eṣa iti ca rājñā paryanuyukto'vravīt-
S03n225:113: prabhūtaṃ me dhanaṃ śakra śaktimacca mahad balam |
S03n225:116: mukhāni paśyāmi na yācakānāṃ yattena mṛtyurdayito mamendra ||34 ||
S03n225:120: imāmavasthāṃ gamitasya yācakaiḥ kathaṃ nu te saṃprati teṣu mānasam |
S03n225:121: pracakṣva tattāvadalaṃ nigūhituṃ vrajeśca saṃpratyapanīya tāṃ yathā ||35 ||
S03n225:124: tadaiva caitarhi ca yācakānāṃ vacāṃsi yācñāniyatākṣarāṇi |
S03n225:125: āśīrmayāṇīva mama priyāṇi yathā tathodetu mamaikamakṣi ||36 ||
S03n225:126: atha tasya rājñaḥ satyādhiṣṭhānabalāt puṇyopacayaviśeṣācca vacanasamanantaramevendranīlaśakalākrāntamadhyamiva nīlotpaladalasadṛśamekaṃ cakṣuḥ prādurabhavat |
S03n225:127: prādurbhūṃte ca tasminnayanāścarye pramuditamanāḥ sa rājā punarapi śakramuvāca-
S03n225:128: yaścāpi māṃ cakṣurayācataikaṃ tasmai mudā dve nayane pradāya |
S03n225:130: athābhivyāhārasamanantarameva tasya rājño vispardhamānamiva tena nayanena dvitīyaṃ cakṣuḥ prādurabhavat |
S03n225:131: tataścakampe sadharādharā dharā vyatītya velāṃ prasasāra sāgaraḥ |
S03n225:133: prasādaramyaṃ dadṛśe vapurdiśāṃ rarāja śuddhyā śaradīva bhāskaraḥ |
S03n225:136: vavau manojñātmaguṇaḥ samīraṇo manassu harṣo jagatāṃ vyajṛmbhata ||40 ||
S03n225:138: nṛpasya karmātiśayastavāśrayāḥ samantataḥ śuśruvire giraḥ śubhāḥ ||41 ||
S03n225:139: aho bataudāryamaho kṛpālutā viśuddhatā paśya yathāsya cetasaḥ |
S03n225:142: amogharūpā bata puṇyasañcayāścirasya dharmeṇa khalūrjitaṃ jitam ||43 ||
S03n225:144: na no na vidito rājaṃstava śuddhāśayāśayaḥ |
S03n225:145: evaṃ nu pratidatte te mayeme nayane nṛpa ||44 ||
S03n225:149: atha bodhisattvo vismayapūrṇamanobhirmandamandanimeṣapravikasitanayanairamātyairanuyātaḥ pauraiścābhivīkṣyamāṇo jayāśīrvacanapuraḥsaraiśca brāhmaṇairabhinandyamānaḥ puravaramucchritadhvajavicitrapatākaṃ pravitanyamānābhyudayaśobhamabhigamya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ sabhājanārthamabhigatasyāmātyapramukhasya brāhmaṇavṛddhapaurajānapadasyaivamātmopanāyikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa-
S03n225:150: ko nāma loke śithilādaraḥ syāt kartuṃ dhanenārthijanapriyāṇi |
S03n225:157: loke parasminniha caiṣa panthāḥ kīrtipradhānasya sukhodayasya ||49 ||
S03n225:158: dhanasya niḥsāralaghoḥ sa sāro yaddīyate lokahitonmukhena |
S03n225:160: tadevaṃ duṣkaraśatasamudānīto'yamasmadarthaṃ tena bhagavatā saddharma iti satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ |
S03n225:161: tathāgatamāhātmye pūrvavacca karuṇāvarṇe'pi vācyam-ihaiva puṇyaphalapradarśane caivaṃ satkṛtyopacitāni puṇyānīhaiva puṣpamātramātmaprabhāvasya kīrtisaṃtatimanoharaṃ pradarśayantīti ||
